name: Working on Ubuntu
body:
#Hello
Hello I am Mehmet Şamil Büyükçağlayan.I was born in 1996 Kastamonu Turkey.Now I am studying at Pamukkale University as computer enigeer and it will be my first page. We will learn how is programming on Ubuntu. Actually I do not know but we will learn it together.

#Let's Learn How is pragramming on Ubuntu
##What should we know :
-What is 'gcc'
-Text editor
-Software Language Education Book
-What is Terminal
-And working zeal

##Starting Ubuntu :

There are many shortcut on ubuntu. One of them is Ctrl + Alt + T this is going to open terminal. We will use here for many times because the terminal more useful on ubuntu. Firstly we should get root permission. Because of that we will write sudo passwd if we do not change password there are some problem on ubuntu some times it dont accept your first password if yoe change it it will be done also you can write same password.
